llm_res.rule: Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
The function approve(address _approved, uint256 _tokenId) external payable; must allow changing or reaffirming the approved address for an NFT.
llm_res.function: The approve function implementation is correct and does not violate the ERC721 standard.

llm_res.rule: The function balanceOf(address _owner) external view returns (uint256); must be implemented to return the number of NFTs owned by `_owner`, possibly zero.
llm_res.function: The balanceOf function is missing in the provided ERC721 implementation.
